snippet: A performance artist arrested Tuesday along with several dissidents and journalists after she sought to set up an open mike in Havana was back in custody on Wednesday.
abstract: Cuban performance artist Tania Bruguera is detained for second time in Havana on her way to unauthorized news conference and public gathering she had called to protest Cuba's limits on freedom of expression; opponents of normalizing relations between United States and Cuba say arrests indicate that Pres Raul Castro does not intend to make political changes.
lead_paragraph: A performance artist arrested Tuesday along with several dissidents and journalists after she sought to set up an open mike in Havana was back in custody on Wednesday.

headline.main: Cuba Arrests Dissidents 2 Weeks After U.S. Accord
headline.print_headline: Cuba Arrests Dissidents 2 Weeks After U.S. Accord
